jobDesc: Collaborated with a team to develop two governmental admin dashboards with advanced data visualization and user management features, enhancing operational efficiency.
Designed and developed a user-friendly interface for a travel guide platform in Nepal, enhancing user experience and accessibility.
Designed, developed, and integrated complex features into the Census Nepal website, improving its functionality, scalability, and user engagement and also intergating visual charts.
Developed a university website with elegant designs and intuitive user experience.
Assisted in debugging and optimizing various projects to improve performance and reliability.
Worked with Git and GitLab for version control and collaborated in an Agile environment to streamline development processes and ensure efficient project delivery.
Developed and implemented a visually appealing website for the startup company, enhancing its online presence and user engagement.
Implemented a custom design for a construction and real estate development business website using WordPress, focusing on user experience, project portfolio, and responsive design.
Implemented a custom design for a consultancy firm's website using WordPress, emphasizing professional services, client engagement, and responsive design.
Developed and implemented advanced features for an online document filling platform, optimizing the process and improving user experience.
Assisted in the development of the very website, contributing to key features and functionality enhancements.
Studied HTML, CSS, React, and gained foundational knowledge in Django, enhancing front-end development skills and exploring backend technologies.

education.title: Bachelors
education.academic: Bachelor's in Electronics, Communication and Information Technology
